description: Message displayed in error notification when an operation fails unexpectedly
defaultMessage: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again and contact {supportEmail} if the condition persists.

description: Message to the user that they must review the application terms of service
defaultMessage: You must agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

description: Button label for the user to save their review of the terms of service
Link text to take the user to the application community guidelines at the Meedan website
Message to encourage the user to read the application community guidelines document
defaultMessage: We ask that you also read our {communityGuidelinesLink} for using {appName}.
